org.openxava.web.layout

Interface ILayoutRowBeginElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILayoutElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ILayoutRowBeginElement
extends ILayoutElement
    Begin marker for row elements.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
